items.title: After intense backlash, India pulls mandate to pre-install government app on smartphones
items.description: On Wednesday, the Indian telecom ministry said Sanchar Saathi, an anti-theft and cybersecurity protection app, would remain voluntary, and that smartp...

items.title: Uber and Avride launch robotaxi service in Dallas
items.description: The robotaxis will initially have a human safety operator behind the wheel who will monitor the ride.

items.title: Healthify upgrades its AI assistant Ria with real-time conversation capabilities
items.description: Healtify is adding live conversation capabilities to its AI assistant, powered by OpenAI's realtime APIs

items.title: All the biggest news from AWS’ big tech show re:Invent 2025
items.description: Amazon Web Services giant tech conference is happening this week with news ranging from chips to AI services.

items.title: Amazon challenges competitors with on-premises Nvidia ‘AI Factories’
items.description: If the product name sounds familiar, it should. It's a collab with Nvidia that combines AWS tech with the chip maker's tech.
